commitResults.messageBody: Added greet(), bidFarewell() methods for Duke to say hi and bye
Added docs for Duke class, greet(), bidFarewell() and makeSeparation() methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Completed implementation of Level 1. Greet, Echo, Exit

commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now can store tasks
added array to store task
modified makeResponse() to handle 'list' command
added '\t' escape sequence to Duke's responses

commitResults.messageTitle: Completed implementation of Level 3. Mark as Done
commitResults.messageBody:
Added Task class
Added checkForCommand() method to check for commands. Improved command handling in makeResponse() method

commitResults.messageTitle: Completed implementation of Level 4. ToDOs, Events, Deadlines
commitResults.messageBody:
Added ToDo, Event and Deadline classes, subclasses of Task class
Added CreareTask() method to handle the creation of correct Task subclasses
Implemented basic error handling using print statements
Added semi automated test-cases, to be tested using runtest.bat

Added DukeException, DukeUnknownInputException and DukeBadInstructionFormatException
Duke now handles wrong commands and wrong format for tasks

Added delete function to Duke.
Added DukeMemory class, which acts as a task manager.
Added enum for commands like "mark", "delete" etc.
Updated Automated Testing.
